title: Bloomberg Markets: Supreme Court Weighing Trump Travel Ban
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Supreme Court Weighing Trump Travel Ban
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Erik Larson U.S. Legal Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing the U.S. Supreme Court poised to act on President Donald Trump’s bid to reinstate his travel ban, which would suspend entry from six mostly Muslim countries for 90 days.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
